item.title: 10-year Treasury yield jumps as investors monitor Fed speeches
item.description: The U.S. 10-year Treasury yield rose above 4.11% on Monday as investors awaited a flurry of speeches from Federal Reserve policymakers.

item.title: Elon Musk offers $1 million a day to entice swing state voters to sign petition
item.description: Elon Musk said he will give away $1 million daily until Election Day to registered voters in swing states who sign his America PAC petition.
